@usedefaults

{{breadcrumb:
    - Repositories : /ays81/Repos
    - Repo $$reponame: /ays81/Repo?repopath=$$ayspath&reponame=$$reponame
}}

{{timestamp}}
@block
@row
h2. Repository: [$$reponame|/ays81/Repo?reponame=$$reponame&repopath=$$repopath]

h4. Actions
{{actions:
- display: Execute blueprint
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/executeBlueprint
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Run
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/createRun
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame

- display: Install
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/install
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame
}}

@col 6
h2. Links:
* [ActorTemplates|ays81/ActorTemplates?ayspath=$$repopath&reponame=$$reponame]
* [Services|ays81/Services?ayspath=$$repopath&reponame=$$reponame]
* [Blueprints|ays81/Blueprints?ayspath=$$repopath&reponame=$$reponame]
* [Explorer|ays81/Explorer?reponame=$$reponame&ayspath=$$repopath]
* [Simulator|ays81/Repo/simulate?repopath=$$repopath&reponame=$$reponame]
* [Runs|ays81/Runs?repo=$$repopath&reponame=$$reponame]
* [Actors|ays81/Actors?repo=$$repopath&reponame=$$reponame]
@colend

@col 6
{{form:
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/quickBlueprint
  display: 'Apply'
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: name
    label: Blueprint Name (leave empty to immediately archive)
    type: text
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame
  - name: contents
    label: Add content of blueprint
    type: textarea
}}
@colend
